general.help:
--------VRC Commands--------
1. `vrcl` | Login to your VRChat account (recommended in private chat)
2. `vrcfl` | Get all friends' information
3. `vrcsu` | Search user
4. `vrcsw` | Search world
5. `vrccl` | Change plugin language
general.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please check the console output.
general.empty_search_keyword: Search keyword cannot be empty, please resend.
general.empty_message: Message cannot be empty, please resend.
general.invalid_ordinal_range: Ordinal out of range, please resend.

login.not_logged_in: Not logged in or login info expired. Please send `vrcl` in private chat to login again.
login.overwrite_login_info: Cached login info detected. After this login, the old info will be overwritten.
login.send_login_info:
Please send your account and password separated by a space. Send 0 to cancel login.
Tip: The bot will save your login status. Please login only if you trust the bot.
login.send_2fa_code: Please send the email verification code or 2FA code within {0} seconds.
login.use_cached_login_info: Cached login info detected, trying to login again.
login.invalid_account: Incorrect username or password, please resend. If you are sure your credentials are 100% correct, please check your email for a new device verification.
login.invalid_info_format: Message format is incorrect. Please resend your account and password separated by a space.

friend.empty_friend: The specified friend does not exist.

user.send_user_name: Please send the player name you want to search.

world.send_world_name: Please send the world name you want to search.

locale.select_locale_tip: Tip: Send the number to select a language, or send 0 to cancel.
